name: yang9112.github.io
description: Personal blog website - Secure modernized version

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/img dist/js/modules && npm run compile-ts && npm run optimize-images && npm run copy-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js-typed
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css css/style.css css/responsive.css css/darkmode.css css/components/comments.css css/components/enhanced-search.css css/components/enhanced-comments.css css/components/breadcrumb.css
scripts.minify-js: cat js/app.js js/modules/gallery.js js/modules/scrollToTop.js js/modules/responsive.js js/modules/preloader.js js/modules/darkmode.js js/modules/search.js > dist/js/bundle.js && npx uglify-js dist/js/bundle.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify-js-typed: npx terser dist/js/app.js js/modules/gallery.js js/modules/scrollToTop.js js/modules/responsive.js js/modules/preloader.js dist/js/modules/sharing.js js/modules/lazyloader.js js/modules/enhanced-search.js js/modules/enhanced-comments.js --compress --mangle -o dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.copy-modules: mkdir -p dist/js/modules && cp js/modules/*.js dist/js/modules/ && cp dist/js/modules/*.js dist/js/modules/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ… Modules copied'
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-modular: npm run copy-modules && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && echo 'âœ… Build and tests completed successfully'
scripts.security-check: npm audit --audit-level=moderate || echo 'ðŸ”’ Security check completed'
scripts.size-check: du -sh dist/ css/ js/ img/ fancybox/
scripts.deploy-check: npm run test && npm run security-check
scripts.optimize-images: mkdir -p dist/img && npm run convert-webp && cp img/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg,ico,webp} dist/img/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ… Images optimized for distribution'
scripts.convert-webp: echo 'Converting images to WebP format...' && for file in img/*.png img/*.jpg img/*.jpeg; do [ -f "$$file" ] && [ ! -f "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .png).webp" ] && cwebp -q 80 "$$file" -o "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .png).webp" 2>/dev/null || true; [ -f "$$file" ] && [ ! -f "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .jpg).webp" ] && cwebp -q 80 "$$file" -o "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .jpg).webp" 2>/dev/null || true; [ -f "$$file" ] && [ ! -f "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .jpeg).webp" ] && cwebp -q 80 "$$file" -o "dist/img/$$(basename "$$file" .jpeg).webp" 2>/dev/null || true; done && echo 'âœ… WebP conversion completed'
scripts.copy-html: cp index-prod.html dist/index.html && echo 'âœ… Production HTML copied'
scripts.lint: echo 'Running basic HTML validation...' && npm run test
scripts.feature-test: npm run test && echo 'âœ… Features tested: Dark Mode & Search'
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npm run build-monitor

author: Anysubway
